options.name: Glory Shield
options.description: When you kill an enemy with a Melee Weapon, you gain Temporary Health equal to the Level of the Enemy killed that lasts for 1 minute.

options.name: Flexible Armor
options.description: Gain +2 Dodge while wearing Medium Armor or Heavy Armor

options.name: Champion
options.description: Gain +1 Damage to Melee Attacks and +1 Athletics

options.name: Free Action : Brutalize
options.description: When you deal a killing blow to an Enemy, you can use your Free Action to brutally savage them. You make a Contested Performance Check against the Resilience of any Enemy within 4 Units. On a success, they become Afraid of you until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Shotcaller
options.description: Your Called Shots do not suffer an Attack Penalty

options.name: Gladiator
options.description: Gain +1 Block and +1 Damage to Piercing Weapons

options.name: Action [Daily]: Finisher
options.description: Make an Attack against a Creature which is an automatic True Hit if it lands. If the Target is Afraid, this Attack gains a 1d4 Bonus. If you use the Brutalize Free Action after making this Attack, this Action is refunded.
